wiki.content:
I Shot the Sheriff is a song written by Bob Marley. The song was first released on The Wailers' album Burnin'.
 
 Eric Clapton recorded a cover version that was included on his album, 461 Ocean Boulevard. It is the most successful version of the song, peaking at #1 on the Billboard Hot 100, becoming Clapton's only chart-topping hit in the U.S.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: I Shot the Sheriff is a song written by Bob Marley. The song was first released on The Wailers' album Burnin'.  Eric Clapton recorded a cover version that was included on his album, 461 Ocean Boulevard. It is the most successful version of the song, peaking at #1 on the Billboard Hot 100, becoming Clapton's only chart-topping hit in the U.S.

track.name: I Shot The Sheriff
comments: one of the best guitarists in the world.
Agreed: the version I'm hearing damn sure isn't Clapton.
This is not Clapton! Is it?
The version I am hearing is not Eric
Ain't feelin' it!..Not today Eric--Not on my watch--Bye!
i shot t he sheriff,killer tune
